posts.post_content:
Looking for grade 4's and higher.

 I don't care what your book says because I own all of them also.  I am willing to buy at fair market.  If you are not willing to sell at Fair market please do not reply.  If you want to sell some cards at what they would go for on Ebay and sorts, minus all the fees so you actually come out with more $ this way then send me a list of what you have to sell. 

 Rare backs are welcome and I understand premium prices so I am willing to negotiate $ for those.

Hi Andrew,

I have the following for sale:

SGC "A"  Bridwell  Broadleaf Multiple strike reverse - amazing error
SGC 50 - Cobb  Pied 25
PSA 4  - Downey  Pied 25
PSA 5  - Hoblitzell Cin. after 1908 stats  Pied 25
SGC 20 - Huggins split image on front & back [80/20]  SC42 red
SGC 50  - Karger  Hassan 
Raw  - Leever  American Beauty green  looks vg/ex
SGC 40  - Chief Meyers  Pied 42  nice looking card
PSA 4  - Turner  Pied 25

Let me know if you are interested in anything & price you will pay

Regards,

Hank
[url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]
I am also very interested in AB backed T205's in any condition.  Please post scans or PM for email address
